titleStmt.title: An order of praier and thankes-giving, for the preseruation of the Queenes Maiesties life and salfetie [sic] to be vsed of the preachers and ministers of the dioces of Winchester. With a short extract of William Parries voluntarie confession, vvritten vvith his owne hand.
Liturgies. Special forms of prayer (Local : Winchester, 1585)
titleStmt.author: Church of England.
Parry, William, d. 1585.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Henry E Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
